mapper.select:
select shm.ht_material_id, shm.material_id, shm.material_code, shm.material_name, shm.material_desc, shm.unit, shm.version,shm.product_model_id, spm.product_model_code as productModelCode, shm.material_type,shm.material_source, shm.barcode_rule_id, shm.if_compoboard, shm.if_linking_board, shm.linking_board_number,shm.status, shm.customer_material_code, shm.min_package_number, shm.create_user_id, u.user_name as createUserName,shm.create_time,shm.modified_user_id, s.user_name as modifiedUserName, shm.modified_time from fantech_imes.smt_ht_material shm left join ocean.sys_user u on shm.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean.sys_user s on shm.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes.smt_product_model spm on shm.product_model_id=spm.product_model_id
1=1
and date_format(shm.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and shm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and shm.material_name like CONCAT('%', #{materialName}, '%')
and shm.material_desc like CONCAT('%', #{materialDesc}, '%')
order by shm.modified_time desc
